author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we take an in-depth look at the all-new Lenovo Legion Go 2 powered by the Ryzen Z2 Extreme APU with a stunning 8.8-inch OLED display. We put it through real-world tests with some of the biggest AAA PC games — including Spider-Man 2, Forza Horizon 5, The Witcher 3, and Street Fighter 6 — to see just how powerful this new handheld gaming PC really is.
We also test the D-Pad performance, compare that gorgeous OLED screen vs the Steam Deck OLED, and measure battery life across multiple TDP profiles to find the best balance between performance and playtime.

Buy The Legion Go 2 from Lenovo: https://howl.link/sqbolwnvo7pw9
